alert.note: Alert for Banner; Kimball (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 21 at 8:42PM CDT until September 21 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Kimball County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Southeastern Banner County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 830 PM MDT. * At 741 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kimball, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kimball, Dix and Kimball Airport. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 17 and 35. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
